title: SVVR-Based Mathematics Learning Effectiveness Improvement Program for K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, geometry, etc.)
context.additional_context: Enhancing Application of Mathematical Concepts through Project-Based Assessment Utilizing Smartphone-Accessible SVVR Content

learning_goals: Learners improve spatial reasoning abilities by 20% while navigating math problems in a 360-degree SVVR environment
Learners write math project reports with over 80% completeness based on data collected through virtual reality activities
Learners identify and correct errors in problem-solving processes three or more times using the SVVR feedback system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
